member.name: PropertyChainValue
member.summary: Represents a property defined on an element.

member.name: PropertyChainValue.Index
member.summary: The index of property in the XAML runtime.

member.name: PropertyChainValue.DeclaringType
member.summary: The base type of the object.

member.name: PropertyChainValue.ValueType
member.summary: The type of the current value of the property.

member.name: PropertyChainValue.ItemType
member.summary: Collection item type, or null if not a collection.

member.name: PropertyChainValue.Value
member.summary: The value of the property. (Represents an InstanceHandle if MetadataBit is set.)

member.name: PropertyChainValue.Overridden
member.summary: Indicates whether the property is overridden by some property in the value chain.

member.name: PropertyChainValue.MetadataBits
member.summary: A bit field that represents MetadataBits.

member.name: PropertyChainValue.PropertyChainIndex
member.summary: The index in the PropertyChainSource returned by GetPropertyValuesChain that represents the source of this property.
